title: Qian Ting Zong Dong Yuan 4: Zhangyu Giyu Ji

synonyms: Happy Little Submarines 4: Adventures of Octopus
alternative_titles.en: Dive Olly Dive and the Octopus Rescue
alternative_titles.ja: 潜艇总动员4：章鱼奇遇记

synopsis: Octopus Paul was chased by his creditors for owing a huge sum of money. In desperation, he could only take his family and fled to the bottom of the sea, living a life of hiding in Tibet. By chance, Paul met a one-eyed shark (voiced by Tan Mantang). Under the instigation and provocation of the one-eyed shark, Paul actually embarked on the road of gambling. It also became arrogant.
